rules_text:
[i]Archbishop of the Loptr Church [/i]– At the beginning of your upkeep, each player loses 3 life. For each opponent that lost life this way, mill twice that many cards.
[i]Fenrir[/i] – {2}{B}{G}, Exile three cards from your graveyard: Destroy target nonland permanent.
[i]Jormungand[/i] – {8}{B}{G}, Exile Manfroy, Archbishop of Loptr: Return each card exiled with Manfroy to your hand, then create a 8/8 black Dragon creature token with flying and menace.
